doc:
Patrick Cranshaw https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrick_Cranshaw 0 Joseph Patrick Cranshaw (June 17, 1919 – December 28, 2005) was an American film and television actor known for his distinctive look and deadpan humor. He is best known for one of his last roles, that of Joseph "Blue" Pulaski, a fraternity brother, in the 2003 hit comedy Old School. Cranshaw also starred as Sheriff Bob in the Air Bud movies and he played the same role in Air Buddies for the final time. Joseph_Patrick_Cranshaw ( June_17_,_1919 – December_28_,_2005 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor known for his_distinctive_look and deadpan_humor . He is_best_known for one of his_last_roles , that of Joseph_"_Blue_"_Pulaski , a_fraternity_brother , in the_2003_hit_comedy_Old_School . Cranshaw also starred as Sheriff_Bob in the_Air_Bud_movies and he played the_same_role in Air_Buddies for the_final_time .
